name: Oliver Steele
body:
### Projects

These are my projects that are currently *served* from GitHub:

* [Fingerboard](/fingerboard) visualizes scale patterns for fretted instruments.
* [DEC Logic Module Simulator](/ffmachine) simulates a *particular configuration* of DEC Logic Modules; for purposes to be revealed.

You can of course see the rest of my repositories [here](https://github.com/osteele?tab=repositories),
and my GitHub profile page [here](https://github.com/osteele).

Other pages:

* [Home page](https://github.com/osteele) (not updated in a while)
* [LinkedIn](www.linkedin.com/in/osteele/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
